data.name: Customers
data.description:
The maximum use of linking given only two datasets: grouping of cases in Customers drawing edges in Customers, linking to cases in Calls grouping of cases in Calls
Records in A are customers, grouped into fraudiness categories Edge records in A are phone calls, grouped by the language of the call

data.name: Calls
data.description:
Records in Calls are data on the phone calls Suppose they're grouped by some other categorical variable: 800, collect, other.
I don't even know if we want to support such complexity, but let's consider it.
